name: Battle High 2 A+
description: The fast-paced fighting action of the Battle High series comes to Steam! Face-off in the tough halls of San Bruno High for the Elementally Advanced as 14 students (and 1 insidious faculty member) and discover the secret behind the mysterious illness stripping students of their powers!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.66Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Graphics Memory and Directx 9.0c Compatible gpu DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 650 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard sound card
